Banner.Description: I am a software architecture engineering graduate from ESPRIT, motivated to start my career as a software engineer to turn my knowledge into real solutions. Passionate about new technologies, high-performance system design, web development, and software testing, I am dedicated to contributing to innovative projects and bringing real value to the team.
AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: During my academic and professional projects, I had the opportunity to work on real-world applications that strengthened my technical and problem-solving skills. I enjoy turning ideas into functional, user-friendly solutions.

I contributed to several impactful projects, including an intelligent Learning Management System, a gym management platform, an IoT e-commerce interface, and a digital document management solution. Each project allowed me to collaborate with teams, understand business needs, and design efficient technical workflows.

I also enjoy exploring software quality and automation tools. I have worked with CI/CD pipelines, testing practices, and modern development environments to ensure clean, reliable, and maintainable code.
Some of the tools, frameworks, and architectures I frequently work with include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Engineer Degree Final Year Internship
Description: Designed and developed an intelligent Learning Management System to centralize and automate employee training paths.
Integrated a request management workflow, personalized learning tracking, and skills evaluation.
Enhanced talent development and improved internal process efficiency.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Summer Internship
Description: Designed and developed an innovative application for gyms, centralizing operations related to members, coaches, schedules, and subscriptions.
Created an ergonomic interface to optimize operational efficiency and user experience.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Summer Internship
Description: Developed the frontend interface for an e-commerce application specialized in selling IoT devices.
Implemented business modules for product tracking, order management, and payment processing.

Experience.Jobs.Title: License Degree Final Year Internship
Description: Designed and deployed an Electronic Document Management (EDM) solution with automated workflows for document classification, storage, and archiving.
Optimized internal processes and reduced dependency on paper.

FeatureProjects.Title: My Projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Highlighted Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Gisselle
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Web application for internal company management that covers sales, collection, and tracking departments, very extensive and complex with various functions made in Angular and Laravel. It works with websockets, schedules, laravel jobs, integrations with WordPress, Zadarma, LiveConnect, etc.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Emelteciot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application for data query, made with Angular and Laravel. The chart.js library is applied.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Vas Aviation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Application for tracking fuel supply requests for aircraft. It has an email module, real-time notifications, CSV file handling for data import, price quotes. Developed in Angular and Laravel.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: GlobalJobs
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-learning platform developed with WordPress. Fully customized design, with plugins developed from scratch. It has a customized payment module, virtual classroom, course tracking dashboard.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: MBElectronics
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: E-commerce platform for technology products. Developed with WordPress and implementing a shipping system for products. It has sales reporting through customized programming.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Agrourbana
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Monitoring application made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, and user management. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tu Super Plan
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Health plans quoter that has an advanced search engine. The plans are shown based on the user's age, monthly income, and location. It has a live chat, contact form, notification system via WhatsApp and email, auth, and internal information management through the admin role.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Proyexiot
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Data monitoring platform for water wells, tugboats, and various installations made from scratch with an auth module, configurable graphs, configurable alarms, user management, and geolocation with openlayers. It also has logic for reactive forms for parameter configuration.

OtherProjects.Title: More Projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Hands Game
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Extended rock-paper-scissors game. A personal project developed in Angular where you play randomly against the machine. It features the use of services, interfaces, and components.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Countries Viewer
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Interface that consumes a countries API where you can view a list of countries, see details of each country, filter by name and region. It also has a dark mode to switch between dark and light themes.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four Card Feature Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page with a minimalist design listing 4 features in 4 cards. Entry animations are used with Angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social Proof Section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a design made in Figma. Angular was used for development along with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ Accordion Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Frequently asked questions accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile Card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple design of a page featuring a profile card with basic information of a person.

Contact.Title: Say Hi!
Contact.Content: I will be glad to hear from you if you want to discuss new opportunities. Write to me, and I will respond as soon as I see your message.
